propositions.text: 淡月清风 is a story centered around 云山庄, a serene mountain villa.
林淡月, known as 淡月医仙, is the owner of 云山庄 and a skilled healer.
小风 is 林淡月's young apprentice, playful yet learning the ways of medicine.
韩清风, a mysterious outsider, arrives at 云山庄 seeking medical help.
韩清风's arrival disrupts the peaceful life at 云山庄, revealing hidden dangers.
韩清风 is a fugitive carrying a secret treasure, pursued by powerful enemies.
林淡月 protects 韩清风 despite the risks, showing her commitment to healing.
Conflict escalates as enemies attack 云山庄, forcing difficult choices.
林淡月 sends 韩清风 away to protect the villa, while facing attackers alone.
小风 grows through adversity, protecting 韩清风 during an ambush.
林淡月 ventures into the江湖 (martial world) to save 韩清风 and seek allies.
Ideological differences cause a rift between 林淡月 and 韩清风 over revenge.
A final battle unites them temporarily, ending in 韩清风's tragic death.
The story concludes with 林淡月 rebuilding 云山庄, honoring 韩清风's memory.

concepts.name: 林淡月
concepts.context: Central character, healer and protector of 云山庄.

concepts.name: 韩清风
concepts.context: Mysterious fugitive whose arrival brings conflict.

concepts.name: 云山庄
concepts.context: Setting of the story, a peaceful villa under threat.

concepts.name: 江湖
concepts.context: Martial world full of danger and conflict.

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a narrative arc from peaceful beginnings at 云山庄, through escalating conflicts introduced by 韩清风, to a climactic battle in the 江湖, and a bittersweet resolution.
